item.title: Re: kaiju
item.content:encoded:
If you get the T3 drop then you're only given 1/3 the chance you would normally have to get the RNG drop, the same as if you had the item beforehand.

In truth, that's probably the best way of doing it. If it were done the other way, with RNG counting first and then T3, that guy would have an even better chance of getting the RNG drop, and if he does, and no one else is T3ing the monster, then no one gets the T3 drop.

item.title: Re: kaiju
item.content:encoded: Indeed, which I find kinda stupid. You should be limited to one drop per kaiju. Someone in my village is using tsukiballs to have the best chance for the RNG drop and since he is the only sannin in the village he auto-gets the T3 drop. I really think if you get the RNG drop then you should not be counted for the T3 drop, or vice versca.
